The fourth entity, the Hindu mob, can also be considered as a "Person" entity as it is a group of people who are responsible for the destruction of the mosque.

The Hindu mob that destroyed the mosque in 1992 is not explicitly mentioned as a person or a group of people, and can be considered as an irrelevant entity in this context.
